name: Phantom Island
description:
You survived a plane crash and you wake up on a mysterious island which is not on the map. Your task is to get out of it and until you manage to do this, you have to survive on it by taking care of the basic needs, creating basic tools and struggling with the local fauna.

Main features

  • Collect resources you can cut down every tree and collect every stone on the map.



  • Craft tools, items and weapon from the colldected resources.
  • Explore the island, investigate their secrets, fight and try to get out of it.
  • Build your shelter a place, where you can rest, store your items and meet your needs.



  • Grow crops, you will need them to satisfy your hunger.



  • Hunt and fish to obtain valuable raw materials and food.
